files.description: Provides a single GetOutputsDir utility that defaults to ./outputs, respects OUTPUT_DIR, and ensures the directory exists for all pipeline writers.

errors.detail:

SUMMARY: Added outputdir.GetOutputsDir utility to centralize outputs path selection (default ./outputs, OUTPUT_DIR override) and ensure the directory exists.

SUMMARY: Implemented outputdir.GetOutputsDir to default to ./outputs, respect OUTPUT_DIR, clean the path, and ensure the directory exists.

files.description: CI workflow that runs gofmt, go test, and basic static checks to ensure cross-platform correctness and prevent regressions.

DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: Added a cross-platform GitHub Actions CI workflow to enforce gofmt, run go test, and run go vet on push and pull requests.

FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml

SUMMARY: Added a cross-platform Go CI workflow running gofmt, go vet, and go test to prevent regressions.

missionDescription: Implement a single output-path utility used everywhere (e.g., get_outputs_dir() that defaults to ./outputs and optionally respects an env var like OUTPUT_DIR), and refactor pipeline writes to go through it.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Removes a known failure mode (absolute /outputs permission/path issues) and enforces the repo-relative ./outputs convention required by the strategic directives, improving reliability of both artifact...
